info.title: Mobile LandLine Info with DND stats India
info.description: Using this API, you can get the details of mobile number and Land Line number all over India. You can find the state, Service Provider and DND etc. Soon other features will be adding to this API. Contact US for Mobile Name Finder API. Cheers, Arun

get.description: GET Indian Mobile LandLine Info with DND stats

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: For Mobile Number Use a 10 Digit mobile number without using +91 and 0. For Landline Number User the number with 4 Digit Code Infront Ex. 04872279173
